title: Mobile-Based Blended Language Learning Course for Working Professionals

context.additional_context: Flexible learning design considering employees' work schedules, combining real-time interaction and self-directed learning via mobile devices.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize 50 core job-related vocabulary items with 80% accuracy
Learners practice 10 basic situational conversation patterns in a mobile environment three or more times
Learners participate in weekly online discussion forums at least twice to conduct language practice with peer learners
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
